form.label: Sequence of search commands
form.searchTemplate: index=_audit search=* sourcetype="audittrail" user=$user$ | rex field=search "^'?(?P<s>.*)'$" | search s=* | eval x=commands(s) | table x | search x=* | eval x=mvappend(x,"END",null) | eval x=mvindex(x,0,10) | nomv x | rex mode=sed field=x "s/\\s/-/g" | stats count by x | sort - count | head 10000

input.label: User
input.populatingSearch: index=_audit search=* sourcetype=audittrail user=* | stats count by user | fields - count | sort user

div.data-options: { "managerid" : "search1", "step_field_name" : "x", "size_field_name" : "count", "height" : "16/9", "explanation_text_line1" : "of searches begins with", "explanation_text_line2" : "this sequence of commands", "trail_element_id" : "trail", "legend_element_id" : "legend" }
